summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Fauntlee Crest S.W. from California Ave. S.W. to approximately 600 feet north of S.W. Donovan St.; and a certain other street and avenue; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution No. 24916 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
